      In Kineshma, a man who stood for a girl at the Zawlzka bar died of injuries

      Crimes and criminality 4 1700

      The assailants are facing time limits under two articles of the Criminal Code.

      In Kineshma, a tournament of the Pancracy of the 80th anniversary of the lifting of the Leningrad blockade was held.

      Sport 1 176

      More than 80 athletes participated.

      In Kinshasa, the auction will sell the collar and bath of the former military unit in the Sollniks.

      Economy and business 0 421

      Torgi will take place on 4 and 5 March.

      The winter football tournament is continuing in Kinshasa.

      Sport 0 217

      Six teams from Vichugi and Kineshma attend the competition.

      Tele2 investigated the market for online dating applications in 2022-2023.

      Kineshma schools participate in the regional mathematical tournament

      Society and Life 0 270

      Classes 4-7 are undergoing tests.

      On 30 January, the lights will be turned off in two houses at the Ula.A.Makarov and Uricka

      CFC and improvement 0 283

      Repair work will be carried out.

      HC " Electric Control " Game HC " Grizzly " with 8:4

      Alexander Burtaev and Alexander Majorov are recognized as the best players of the team and the match.

      The Kinesh theatre will present the “Little Tragedies” with the Russian People ' s Artist, Vitalie Stuzev

      The Year of Pushkin will be opened in Kinshasa on 2 February.

      In the central park of Kineshma, a snow figure contest was held

      Society and Life 1 586

      The Paradise of Snow Whites has taken care of the Year of the Family.

      Kineshma students encouraged drivers to lower speeds to reduce risk of accidents

      Education and youth 6 423

      They became participants in the event together with the inspectors.

      Thanks to MegaFon, the high-speed Internet in Podmoskovje has become round-table.

      Economy and business 0 216

      The operator upgraded the transport network and increased the rate of data transmission in the largest urban districts of Moscow province.

      120-million repairs to the Kinesh Corrrection School completed

      Capital work has been done on a federal project.

      In Kinshasa, a concert was held with the " Blocal eternity of the page "

      The Veterans have wanted long years of life and peaceful skies over their heads.

      Caratists from 5 regions took part in the open-up of Kyoto

      Society and Life 0 300

      More than 190 sportsmen fought for the awards.

      19 Kinesh projects are included in the support programme for local initiatives for 2024

      CFC and improvement 5 928

      Some 200 million roubles will be sent to 225 projects from the regional budget.

      Week: Quinesma Medicines will provide office accommodation

      The main events of the city in the video media in the past week.
